oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dinuclear copper complexes of N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene or 5-bromo-2-hydroxybenzylidene)-4,6-O-ethylidene-beta-D-glucopyranosylamine: Coordination variation and structural diversity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAH, AK
RAO, CP
SAARENKETO, PK
RISSANEN, K
VAN ALBADA, GA
REEDIJK, J
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dinuclear Cu(II) complexes of N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene or 5-bromo-2-hydroxybenzylidene)-4,6-O-ethylidene-beta-D-glucopyranosylamine with coordination variation and molecular and lattice structural variations are explored.
